actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to provide financial assistance to persons whose small businesses are displaced by Federal and federally assisted programs so they may lease, rent, or buy replacement quarters.

summary.text: Makes available financial assistance to persons whose small businesses are displaced by Federal or federally assisted programs to enable them to either: (1) lease or rent replacement quarters for a period not to exceed four years; or (2) make a downpayment for such quarters. States that such payments shall not exceed $4,000.

titles.title: A bill to provide financial assistance to persons whose small businesses are displaced by Federal and federally assisted programs so they may lease, rent, or buy replacement quarters.
